-- | A collection of Nemesis tasks to bootstrap a Haskell project with a focus on continuous integration

@package nemesis-titan
@version 2014.5.19

module System.Nemesis.Titan
angel_template :: StringTemplate String
angel_live_template :: StringTemplate String
guard_template :: StringTemplate String
haskell_template :: StringTemplate String
titan_spec :: IO ()
data Config
Config :: String -> String -> String -> String -> String -> String -> String -> String -> String -> String -> Config
pid_name :: Config -> String
bin_directory :: Config -> String
config_directory :: Config -> String
haskell_source_directory :: Config -> String
project_name :: Config -> String
file_name :: Config -> String
ghc_arg_string :: Config -> String
ghc_default_arg_string :: Config -> String
guard_arg_string :: Config -> String
guard_default_arg_string :: Config -> String
__guard_default_arg_string :: :-> Config String
__guard_arg_string :: :-> Config String
__ghc_default_arg_string :: :-> Config String
__ghc_arg_string :: :-> Config String
__file_name :: :-> Config String
__project_name :: :-> Config String
__haskell_source_directory :: :-> Config String
__config_directory :: :-> Config String
__bin_directory :: :-> Config String
__pid_name :: :-> Config String
titan_with_config :: Config -> Unit
titan :: String -> Unit
data MacAppArgs
MacAppArgs :: String -> Maybe String -> String -> [String] -> Config -> Maybe String -> Maybe String -> MacAppArgs
derived_data_path :: MacAppArgs -> String
scheme_name :: MacAppArgs -> Maybe String
target_name :: MacAppArgs -> String
frameworks :: MacAppArgs -> [String]
mac_app_config :: MacAppArgs -> Config
mac_app_project_name :: MacAppArgs -> Maybe String
mac_app_file_name :: MacAppArgs -> Maybe String
__mac_app_file_name :: :-> MacAppArgs (Maybe String)
__mac_app_project_name :: :-> MacAppArgs (Maybe String)
__mac_app_config :: :-> MacAppArgs Config
__frameworks :: :-> MacAppArgs [String]
__target_name :: :-> MacAppArgs String
__scheme_name :: :-> MacAppArgs (Maybe String)
__derived_data_path :: :-> MacAppArgs String
default_mac_app_config :: Config
titan_mac_app :: MacAppArgs -> Unit
safe_spec :: IO () -> IO ExitCode
halt :: IO ()
with_spec :: IO () -> IO b -> IO ()
instance Default MacAppArgs
instance Show MacAppArgs
instance Default Config
instance Show Config
instance Eq Config
